original: intros f1 f2 f3 f4 T H1 H2. unfold iffH in H1, H2. unfold SysPrf in *. apply iff_Trans with (f2 := impH (orH f1 f2) (orH f3 f4)). - apply reduceImp. + apply reduceOrL in H1. auto. + apply reduceOrL in H2. auto. - apply reduceImp. + apply reduceOrR in H1. auto. + apply reduceOrR in H2. auto.
